title: Not first choice but still first class
text:
It was the second solo trip I took to London, and although, for unforseen circumstances, I was unable to stay at my originally planned hotel it was still beyond lovely.
The layout was modern and bright, the room itself was the same, though the bathroom design did bemuse me (glass pannel covers half bath so shower still ends with a drenched floor).
And other than a slip of the tongue the staff couldn't do enough.
The surrounding view, mostly to the back, is beautiful, especially at night.
I'd advise anyone who goes to London to stay here.
